mapper.select: select sum(B.qty *C.price) from (select no , regdate from br_sales where regdate >= to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd') and regdate < to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd')+365) A, br_sales_detail B, product C where A.no = B.br_sales_no and B.product_no = C.no

select sum(B.qty *C.price) from (select no , regdate from br_sales where regdate >= to_date('${value}01', 'yyyymmdd') and regdate < to_date('${value}01', 'yyyymmdd')+30) A, br_sales_detail B, product C where A.no = B.br_sales_no and B.product_no = C.no

select sum(B.qty *C.price) from (select no , regdate from br_sales where regdate like to_date('${value}', 'yyyymmdd')) A, br_sales_detail B, product C where A.no = B.br_sales_no and B.product_no = C.no

select F.name, sum("psum") as price from( select* from( select * from(select Z.br_sales_no, sum(Z.qty * Y.price)as "psum" from br_sales_detail Z, product Y where Z.product_no = Y.no group by br_sales_no) A, br_sales B where A.br_sales_no = B.no)C , Branch D where C.branch_no = D.no and C.regdate >= to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd') and C.regdate < to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd')+365 )F group by F.name

select name, "psum" as price from( select row_number() over (order by "psum" desc) rn, name, "psum" from( select DISTINCT name, "psum" from( select * from( select Y.name, sum(Z.qty * Y.price)as "psum" from br_sales_detail Z, product Y where Z.product_no = Y.no group by Y.name)A, br_sales B where B.regdate >= to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd') and B.regdate < to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd')+365))) where rn >= 1 and rn <=5
select sum(price*qty) as Total from hq_order_detail where regdate >= to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd') and regdate < to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd')+365

select regdate as name, "psum" as price from(select distinct row_number() over (order by regdate asc) rn, regdate, sum(D.qty * D.price) "psum" from (select to_char (A.regdate, 'mm') as regdate, B.qty, C.price from br_sales A, br_sales_detail B, product C where A.no = B.br_sales_no and B.product_no = C.no) D group by regdate) T where rn <= 5

select regdate as name, "psum" as price from(select distinct row_number() over (order by regdate desc) rn, regdate, sum(D.qty * D.price) "psum" from (select to_char (A.regdate, 'yyyymmdd') as regdate, B.qty, C.price from br_sales A, br_sales_detail B, product C where A.no = B.br_sales_no and B.product_no = C.no) D group by regdate) T where rn <= 10
select gender as name, count(*) as price from BR_SALES group by gender
select ages as name, count(*) as price from BR_SALES group by ages order by ages asc
select payment as name, count(*) as price from BR_SALES group by payment

select D.name as name, sum("psum") as price from( select * from( select DISTINCT smallcategory_no, "psum" from( select Y.smallcategory_no, sum(Z.qty * Y.price)as "psum" from br_sales_detail Z, product Y where Z.product_no = Y.no group by Y.smallcategory_no)A, br_sales F where F.regdate >= to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd') and F.regdate < to_date('${value}0101', 'yyyymmdd')+365)S, smallCategory B where S.smallcategory_no = B.no)G, largecategory D where G.largeCategory_no=D.no group by D.name
